channel.title: EP16: Missing Values in Clinical Research
channel.description: Recent content on EP16: Missing Values in Clinical Research

item.title: EP16: Missing Values in Clinical Research
item.description: [This website is currently under construction] This website contains slides and materials for the Multiple Imputation part of NIHES course Missing Values in Clinical Research (EP16). Practicals are available as interactive learnr tutorials (links will follow) as well as in a static html version. The practicals require R and JAGS to be installed and use the following R packages: (JAGS (and rjags) are only necessary for the parts of the practical that use the JointAI package.

item.title: 01 - Getting to know your incomplete data
